subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Dempsey scored his first international hat trick in the Americans’ 6-0 victory in a Gold Cup quarterfinal, drawing praise from his teammates and coach for his attitude.
snippet: Dempsey scored his first international hat trick in the Americans’ 6-0 victory in a Gold Cup quarterfinal, drawing praise from his teammates and coach for his attitude.
